Class Transform

Class defined in: src/gestures/transform.js:4

User want to scale or rotate with 2 fingers Preventing the default browser behavior is a good way to improve feel and working. This can be done with the preventDefault option.

  • Properties
  • Events
transformMinRotation <Number>
src/gestures/transform.js:109

rotation in degrees

Default: 1
transformMinScale <Number>
src/gestures/transform.js:101

minimal scale factor, no scale is 1, zoomin is to 0 and zoomout until higher then 1

Default: 0.01
